

.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_05_glm_second_level:

===========================
GLM: Second level analysis
===========================

These are examples focused on showcasing second level models functionality and group level analysis.

See :ref:`glm` for more details.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="This example shows how a second-level design matrix is specified: assuming that the data refer ...">
